title: Introduction
content: # Box Model Parts ## Content - frame of reference - Inside the box ## Padding - Increases the size of the box - will include baackground color of the element ## Border - Goes around the padding of the element ## Margin - Spacing outside the border - Separates elements from each other ## Height and Width - Controls the size of an elements content ## Overflow - Control on element that is too big for the container ## Size * min height and width - Height should be at least that size * height and width - Height should be exactly that size
